thread.title: Darrell and Sheila
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Darrell and Sheila

author: Darrell and Sheila
title: Darrell and Sheila
text: We have been members for over two years and have completed over ten sits during that time. We have had nothing but positive experiences with each and every house/pet sit. As with the homes, all the homeowners have been different but very welcoming and eager to make us feel comfortable. We remain friends with most of them. The pets themselves range from very outgoing and energetic to very timid. All have provided us with good companionship. We look forward to completing many more house/pet assignments during the next few years, with THS.
